title: Amid COVID-19 case surge, Delhi govt suspends physical classes, offline exams
description: Students of Class 10 and 12 have been demanding that the board exams scheduled in May-June be either cancelled or conducted in online mode Amid a surge in coronavirus cases, the Delhi government on Friday ordered the suspension of physical academic activities and offline examinations for all classes till further orders.

title: Inauguration of new Chandni Chowk cancelled as Covid-19 cases spike in Delhi
description: The redeveloped area – a 1.3-km stretch between Red Fort and Fatehpuri Mosque – was scheduled to be inaugurated by the CM at 11 am on April 17.

title: Complacency and Missteps Deepen a Covid-19 Crisis in India
description: The new wave will hurt global efforts and vaccine supplies, experts say. Researchers are scrambling to assess whether new coronavirus variants are playing a role in India.

title: Coronavirus Lockdown India April 9 Highlights: Delhi reports steep 1-day hike with over 8,000 new cases; Kejriwal shuts down schools
description: Coronavirus India Lockdown, Covid-19 Cases in India, Maharashtra, Madhya Pradesh, Delhi Night Curfew April 9 Highlights: As India stares at another health crisis, Prime Minister Narendra Modi yesterday held a meeting with chief ministers/administrators of states/UTs. He stressed on creation of micro-containment zones, asked CMs to focus on test and trace

title: Delhi reports 8,521 fresh COVID-19 cases, second highest since pandemic began
description: Meanwhile, with 39 related fatalities the death toll touched 11,196.The national capital also saw 5,032 discharges today taking the recovery total to 6,68,699

title: Delhi sees massive spike in daily COVID-19 cases; Mumbai remains among worst-affected cities
description: Maharashtra remains the worst-affected state in the country by COVID-19 while the virus situation in Delhi and Karnataka continue to deteriorate by each passing day.

title: Delhi: JNU directs officials to be vigilant after 24 students test COVID-19 positive
description: In view of the rising cases of coronavirus, the university has sent out a number of instructions to the officials and residents of the campus which include ensuring adherence to safety guidelines like wearing a face mask, maintaining hand hygiene and social distancing.

title: 95k incoming passengers tested in Delhi, positivity rate 1.28%
description: At high-level meeting, call taken to ‘ramp up medical infrastructure and preparedness to November 2020 levels’.

title: Delhi, Haryana announce closure of schools amid COVID-19 surge
Delhi schools to stay shut till further orders amid spike in COVID-19 cases: Arvind Kejriwal - Jagran English
description: Delhi schools to stay shut till further orders amid spike in COVID-19 cases: Arvind Kejriwal

title: COVID-19: 35 doctors test positive at AIIMS Delhi
description: The national capital reported 7,437 new positive cases on Thursday, with positivity rate at 8.10 per cent. Active cases in Delhi stood at 23,181.

title: 44th Delhi Skirt Game set for August
description: After being canceled in 2020 due to COVID-19, the 44th Delhi Skirt Game is set to be played on August 13, 2021.

title: COVID-19: Delhi Metro penalises 648 commuters for violating protocols
description: COVID-19: Delhi Metro penalises 648 commuters for violating protocols - The Delhi Metro Rail Corporation (DMRC) has also urged the commuters to follow the protocols and politely counsel others to do the same.

title: Covid-19 spike: As Delhi govt imposes night curfew, migrant workers leave city
description: One year down the line, when many presumed the Covid-19 situation to get somewhat better, on the contrary, Covid-19 cases are on a surge in the national capital with more than 7,000 cases surfacing on a daily basis.

title: Migrants leave Delhi, Mumbai in trains and buses amid fear of lockdown as Covid-19 cases surge
description: The Ministry of Railways denied reports of mass movement of people.

title: Ground report: What is the Covid-19 situation in Delhi
description: Delhi registered over 7,400 Covid-19 cases and 24 fatalities due to the infection on Thursday in the last 24 hours in the last 24 hours, according to the figures released by the heath department.

title: In 10 days, Delhi’s Covid-19 positivity rate jumps from 2.8% to 8.10%
description: Delhi recorded 7437 new cases of Covid-19 infection Thursday, the highest single-day spike since November 19 when the city saw 7546 cases of the disease.

title: As Covid-19 cases surge in Delhi, Rajiv Gandhi hospital suspends all non-Covid services
description: As Covid-19 cases continue to mount in Delhi, the Rajiv Gandhi Super Specialty Hospital has stopped all other non-Covid services at the facility to tackle the rapid spread in coronavirus cases.

title: Delhi, Maharashtra, Odisha, other states issue new guidelines to curb rise in COVID-19 cases - India News , Firstpost
description: While a night curfew from 10 pm to 5 am has been imposed in Delhi, the district of Raipur will remain under lockdown till 19 April

title: Delhi: As COVID cases surge, RT-PCR testing capacity hits max potential at 51,000 per day
description: Delhi: Out of the 85,000 tests which have been conducted daily over the past eight days, 51,000 have been RT-PCR and the rest were Rapid Antigen Tests.

title: India's COVID-19 infections, deaths surge as migrants start to flee cities
description: India reported another record number of new COVID-19 infections on Friday and daily deaths hit their highest in more than five months, as it battles a second wave of infections and states complain of a persistent vaccine shortage.

title: COVID-19: Coaching centres seek clarity on Delhi government SOPs on physical classes
description: Many big coaching centres are conducting physical classes partially, while smaller institutes are confused over the guidelines.

title: Curbs in Mumbai, Bengaluru, Delhi and other cities as Covid-19 crisis deepens
description: Maharashtra, Chhattisgarh, Karnataka, Uttar Pradesh, Delhi, Madhya Pradesh, Tamil Nadu, Gujarat, Kerala and Punjab have shown a rise in the Covid-19 daily new cases

title: COVID-19: Delhi High Court, district courts to stop physical hearing of cases from today
description: COVID-19: Delhi High Court, district courts to stop physical hearing of cases from today - The Delhi High Court and all district courts of Delhi had resumed physical hearing from March 15, 2021.

title: COVID-19 surge: All Delhi schools closed till further orders
description: Due to a surge in COVID cases, all schools in Delhi are being closed for all classes till further orders, CM Arvind Kejriwal announced

title: Delhi COVID surge: Government orders to increase 1,000 beds in two hospitals
description: 115 private hospitals having bed strength of 50 or more, or already registered for COVID-related treatment, are directed to reserve at least 50% of their total ICU and wards bed capacity.these 115 hospitals have the liberty to reserve more beds than required as per the order

title: More platforms earmarked for cremation of COVID-19 victims in Delhi: Civic bodies
description: At the Nigambodh Ghat in north Delhi, there are six CNG-based furnaces, out of which three are reserved for cremating COVID victims,said.

title: Delhi Metro's flying squad penalises 672 commuters for violating Covid-19 rules
description: Delhi Metro Rail Corporation (DMRC) also urged the commuters to follow the protocols and politely counsel others to do the same.

title: Delhi adds 5,506 Covid-19 cases, 20 more deaths
description: The seven-day rolling average of infections also crossed the 4,000 mark, which is for the first time since December 4 last year, indicating the return of the city’s Covid graph to levels not seen since the third wave that lasted from October to December in 2020.

title: Covid-19: Few follow the rules at Delhi’s busy weekly markets
description: HT visited two such markets and saw poor compliance of social distancing protocols with shoppers jostling with each other for space. Last week, the Delhi government identified weekly markets among several super-spreader areas where enforcement efforts and awareness campaigns were required.

title: 'Wearing Mask While Driving Alone Mandatory to Prevent COVID-19': Delhi HC - The Wire Science
description: The court observed that even a private vehicle like a car with one person in it becomes a public space in the context of COVID-19.

title: Maharashtra sees highest spike of 60,000 COVID-19 cases, Delhi reports 5,500 infections in last 24 hours - Jagran English
description: Maharashtra sees highest spike of 60,000 COVID-19 cases, Delhi reports 5,500 infections in last 24 hours

title: Covid-19: Delhi night curfew leaves many IT, BPO employees stranded
description: The night curfew imposed by Delhi government to halt the spread of Covid-19 left many employees from Information Technology (IT) and Business Process Outsourcing (BPO) firms stranded on Tuesday.

title: As Delhi Covid-19 cases cross 5,000, AIIMS chalks out new plan
description: From vacating non-Covid beds at the earliest to switching academic activities to an online mode, the country's top medical institute is reactivating its Covid-19 taskforce.

title: Delhi: 5100 new COVID-19 cases in last 24 hrs, will night curfew help out?
description: In view of the rapid increase in COVID-19 cases, the Delhi government led by Arvind Kejriwal has imposed a night curfew in the capital from 6 April. The curfew will continue from 10 pm to 5 am till 30 April. Watch video on Zee News

title: Coronavirus India April 6 Highlights: Delhi reports over 5,000 cases; DMRC issues new entry rules at metro stations
description: Coronavirus India Lockdown April 6 Highlights: Union Health Minister Harsh Vardhan to meet his counterparts from 11 hotspot states/UTs today; The meeting will also set the agenda for PM Narendra Modi’s Thursday meeting with state CMs and UTs administrators to discuss ways to contain the Covid-19 spike.

title: Delhi, Mumbai, Bengaluru: These cities/districts are under curbs as Covid-19 cases rise
description: Apart from movement restrictions, state governments are suspending physical classes, making RT-PCR test report mandatory for incoming passengers in a bid to contain the spread of the infection.

title: Coronavirus LIVE: Delhi sees 5,000-plus new cases; over 10,000 in Mumbai
description: Coronavirus live updates: Maharashtra reported 47,288 new coronavirus cases in the last 24 hours. Delhi govt has imposed night curfew in the national capital. Stay tuned for corona-related news

title: Highlights: More than 76,000 beneficiaries vaccinated against Covid in Delhi
description: The global tally of Covid-19 cases is at nearly 131.7 million, while the death toll is nearing the three million mark, the Johns Hopkins University tracker shows.

title: Coronavirus news highlights: 10,030 new COVID-19 cases in Mumbai, Delhi reports 5,100
description: Union Health Minister Harsh Vardhan will on Tuesday hold a meeting with health ministers of 11 states and Union Territories, which has been witnessing a surge in coronavirus cases, to review the situation there. These 11 states are Maharashtra, Chhattisgarh, Delhi, Gujarat, Haryana, Himachal Pradesh, Jharkhand, Karnataka, Madhya Pradesh, Punjab and Rajasthan.Get latest Healthcare online at cnbctv18.com

title: Delhi Metro issues new travel rules for the month of April amid COVID-19 surge
description: DMRC also advises its users, who do not fall in essential category, to complete journey and reach there destination by 10 pm

title: Beware of violating COVID-19 norms at Delhi airport! Government imposes Rs 2,000 fine on violators
description: Over the past few days, with the national capital recording upwards of 4,000 cases on Sunday, several air travellers have been complaining that COVID-19 prevention norms like wearing face masks and observing social distancing are being ignored.

title: Delhi increases number of beds reserved for Covid-19 patients
description: These hospitals include Lok Nayak Hospital (LNJP), where beds are to be increased from 300 to 1,000

title: Delhi and Mumbai report slight dip in COVID-19 cases after record spikes, here's why case count falls on Mondays - Jagran English
description: Delhi and Mumbai report slight dip in COVID-19 cases after record spikes, here's why case count falls on Mondays

title: 9 students test positive for Covid-19 at school in Delhi
description: Nine students have tested positive for COVID-19 at Arya Kanya Gurukul in Rajinder Nagar in the national capital. The school has been closed till further orders

title: COVID-19: Daily cases rise past 4000 in Delhi, ICU beds running out fast
description: Sunday marks repeat of highest toll this year, cases at a record high; over half of ICU beds with ventilators occupied

description: Coronavirus live updates: India saw a grim record of most fatalities due to Covid in a single day in 2021 on Saturday. Stay tuned for corona-related news

title: Delhi: Restaurants, night clubs fined for not following COVID-19 guidelines
description: FIRs were registered against the owners of Jain Chawal Wala at Connaught Place, Informal Restaurant at Janpath and others.Police conducted a two-day special drive to crackdown on those violating COVID-19 safety guidelines

title: Delhi & Maharashtra flouting Covid norms, hence surge in cases: AIIMS professor
description: The fresh Covid-19 cases declined slightly in the national capital on Saturday.The cumulative positivity rate is 4.48% and the total samples tested in the last 24 hours are 79,617
